original_text:
And were my head lifted up, you would hunt me like a lion
    and again work wonders against me.
korean_text: 내가 머리를 높이 들면 주께서 젊은 사자처럼 나를 사냥하시며 내게 주의 놀라움을 다시 나타내시나이다

sentences.original_text: And were my head lifted up
you would hunt me like a lion
and again work wonders against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다시 나를 대적하여 기적을 행하실 것입니다.
